explorationThemes.Name: Star System Mapping
explorationThemes.Description: Charting new star systems and identifying celestial bodies.

explorationThemes.Name: Deep Space Reconnaissance
explorationThemes.Description: Gathering intelligence on unknown territories and phenomena in deep space.

explorationThemes.Name: Cosmic Anomaly Research
explorationThemes.Description: Investigating strange cosmic anomalies like wormholes and quantum fluctuations.

explorationThemes.Name: Exoplanet Expeditions
explorationThemes.Description: Embarking on expeditions to distant exoplanets for study and exploration.

explorationThemes.Name: Astrobiological Surveys
explorationThemes.Description: Studying astrobiological aspects of celestial bodies to search for signs of life.

explorationThemes.Name: Ancient Signal Tracing
explorationThemes.Description: Tracing and deciphering ancient signals of unknown origin across the galaxy.

explorationThemes.Name: Galactic Cartography
explorationThemes.Description: Creating detailed maps of galactic sectors, including nebulae and asteroid fields.

explorationThemes.Name: Interstellar Phenomena Documentation
explorationThemes.Description: Documenting and studying phenomena like supernovas and black holes.

explorationThemes.Name: Lost Civilization Search
explorationThemes.Description: Searching for clues or remnants of ancient civilizations in remote parts of the galaxy.

explorationThemes.Name: Quantum Field Exploration
explorationThemes.Description: Exploring quantum fields to understand their impact on space travel and communication.
